definitions.title: vb. Pi.
definitions.body: receive, take (late) (Aram. loan-word (and in Aram. denom.) Gerber:32, cf. Aram. [[קְבֵיל]]([[לִ]]) in front, menqbuwl opposite, B Aram. [[לָקֳבֵל]] before, O Aram. Palm. [[לקבל]] over against, Nab. id., in view of; also Sab. [[לקבל]] in view of CIS:iv, No. 79, 11. 2. 4. 5. 8, As. ḳablu, encounter; verbs are: Sab. [[קבל]] accept, DHM:ZMG xxix (1875), 615; xxx (1876), 672; Ar. qabila be in front, opposite, qabala accept, admit; Eth. qabala:, esp. 111. 2, go to meet, accept; NH [[קָבַל]] accuse, Pi. = BH; Aram. [[קַבֵּל]], qabel receive);—Pf. 3 ms. [[קִבֵּל]] Es 4:4 + (Es 9:27 Qr [[קִבְּלוּ]]); 3 pl. [[קִבּלוּ]] Ezr 8:30; Impf. 3 ms. sf. [[וַיְקַנְּלֵם]] 1Ch 12:19 (v:1Ch 12:18 van d. H.); 3 mpl. [[וַיְקַבְּלוּ]] 2Ch 29:16, 2Ch 29:22; 1 pl. [[נְקַבֵל]] Job 2:10, Job 2:10; Imv. ms. [[קַבֵּל]] Pr 19:20, [[קַבֶּל־]] 1Ch 21:11;—
take, c. acc. rei 2Ch 29:22, Ezr 8:30; acc. om. 2Ch 29:16, + [[ל]] reflex. = choose 1Ch 21:11; receive, c. acc. pers. 1Ch 12:19 (van d. H. v:18).
accept, c. acc. rei Job 2:10, Job 2:10; [[מוּסָר]] ´[[ק]]: Pr 19:20; acc. om. Es 4:4.
accept, assume, and obligation, sq. cl., Es 9:23, sq. inf. v:Es 9:27 (+ [[עַל]] reflex.).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pt. fpl. [[מַקְבִּילֽת]] shew oppositeness, i.e. correspond, one to ([[אֶל]]) another Ex 26:5, Ex 36:12 (both P).
